radiographic_examinations.findings: Small bilateral pleural effusions with associated compressive atelectasis, unchanged. The gallbladder surgically absent. Fluid in the cholecystectomy bed has decreased since the prior CT. A small amount of perihepatic ascites, unchanged. Evaluation limited by motion degradation, streak artifact, and patient body habitus.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Fluid in the cholecystectomy bed has decreased since the prior CT.
